component.name: MakeMKV plugin for VLC
component.summary: Provides MakeMKV features for direct Blu-ray playback in VLC.

description.p: You also need a license key to use this, you can buy one or get a trial one on MakeMKV website. Then you can add the license from MakeMKV GUI (also available on Flathub) or by editing ~/.MakeMKV/settings.conf (app_Key property).
NOTE: users of this software must accept the terms of the "End User License Agreement".
